price: 13. En waarlijk, zij zullen hun eigen last dragen en andere lasten naast hun eigen, en waarlijk, zij zullen ondervraagd worden op de Dag der Opstanding over wat zij plachten te verzinnen.
arabic: وَلَيَحۡمِلُنَّ أَثۡقَالَهُمۡ وَأَثۡقَالٗا مَّعَ أَثۡقَالِهِمۡۖ وَلَيُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walayaḥmilunna athqālahum wa-athqālan maʿa athqālihim walayus'alunna yawma al-qiyāmati ʿammā kānū yaftarūna
translations: and surely they will be questioned
